article.title: Patent Citation Indexing and the Notions of Novelty, Similarity, and Relevance
article.author: Garfield, Eugene
article.text: The unique features of the "references cited" in U.S. patents are discussed in relation to their use in the patent section of the Science Citation Index, which adds a new dimension to patent searching.. Citation indexing provides a new basis for clarifying the concepts of similarity, coupling, novelty, and relevance..
